events.event_description: U.S. uranium miners produced over 82,000 pounds of uranium concentrate in Q1 2024, exceeding total 2023 production of 50,000 pounds.
events.citation: Uranium miners in the United States produced more than 82,000 pounds of uranium concentrate in the first quarter of 2024, more than in all of 2023. Domestic uranium mines produced 50,000 pounds of triuranium octoxide (U3O8), also called uranium concentrate, in 2023

events.event_description: The White Mesa Mill in Utah ceased production, leading to declined uranium production in 2023, while five in-situ recovery facilities remained operational.
events.citation: Production declined in 2023 because the United States' only operating conventional uranium mill, the White Mesa Mill in Utah, did not produce. During 2023, uranium concentrate production occurred at five in-situ recovery facilities, four in Nebraska and one in Wyoming.

events.event_description: U.S. civilian nuclear power reactors purchased 51.6 million pounds of uranium concentrate in 2023, a 27% increase from 2022, at an average price of $43.80 per pound.
events.citation: In 2023, owners and operators of U.S. civilian nuclear power reactors purchased 51.6 million pounds of uranium concentrate, a 27% increase from 2022. These purchases were made at a total weighted-average price of $43.80 per pound, an increase of 12% from a $39.08 per pound average price in 2022.

events.event_description: The United States banned imports of uranium products from Russia starting in August 2024, with possible waivers through January 1, 2028.
events.citation: In May, the United States banned imports of uranium products from Russia beginning in August, although companies may apply for waivers through January 1, 2028.

events.event_description: The Russian uranium import ban unlocked $2.72 billion in funding to build out the domestic nuclear fuel supply chain and support nuclear power plant operators.
events.citation: The passage of the ban on uranium imports from Russia also unlocks $2.72 billion in funding to build out the domestic nuclear fuel supply chain and support new and existing nuclear power plant operators.
